snippet.title: Cornucopias | 2023 Pre-Alpha Development
snippet.description:
Cornucopias is a free to play MMORPG game created on Unreal Engine 5.

In this video, the team showcases the accomplishments of 2023, including the launch of Pre-Alpha testing, Calido Valley, racing, mining and Solace 1 & 2. The Cornucopias team is creating a 100% custom UE5+ cutting-edge experience through immersive gameplay, an exciting story, exceptional artwork and innovative economics. 

Cornucopias offers each player the ability to pave their own way in a wide variety of gameplay including: building, crafting, farming, mining, logging, fishing, PVP combat, PVE Combat, exploring, flying, trading, racing, upgrading and MMO leveling. Cornucopias players also have the ability to own their own in-game assets, such as land plots, vehicles and much more. Cornucopias is a network of floating domes (colonies) in a post-apocalyptic alternate version of Earth. The domes have diverse themes and characteristics. Here, players can travel around the vast world of Cornucopias and complete quests or choose their own path. 

Linktree: https://linktr.ee/cornucopiasgame
